1276380.name: Knights And Bikes Soundtrack
1276380.description:
The official soundtrack for award-winning solo/co-op adventure KNIGHTS AND BIKES, written and performed by Daniel Pemberton (Spiderman: Enter The Spiderverse, Dark Crystal, Birds Of Prey, King Arthur: Legend Of The Sword).

With the music we wanted you to feel the excitement, imagination, wonder, mystery and fun of being a kid and cycling around on an adventure of epic proportions.
It also needed to feel unique to Penfurzy island, where the game is set, in the late 1980s. So we created a sonic world as wonderful and crazy as the island itself - roping in our friend’s nine year old kid to sing punk vocals on the thrashy “I Wanna Ride My Bike”; making mad moody synthtronica for “Lazer Thunder”; stoner space dad beats on “Pontefract Rock”; the 8-bit sounds of the Magus video game console; and of course establishing the Knights And Bikes theme across the journey of Nessa and Demelza.
